Their team is very organized and very pleasant to work with — always a step ahead and ready to assist.” — , Sarma (Somerville, MA) Fernando Neves Reliable new revenue models for restaurants, wine shops, butchers, and more Table22 is the only system built for beyond-four-wall offerings like subscriptions, drops, and pre-orders Boston, MA Sarma Miami, FL Boia de Austin, TX Antonelli’s Cheese Brooklyn, NY WINNER Seattle, WA Musang New York, NY Il Buco Alimentari Learn more Grow your sales, not your workload Table22 powers your storefront, processes payments, does customer service, creates branded marketing, and handles fulfillment — all under your brand Automated marketing Launch campaigns, track conversions, and retain members using CRM tools built specifically for hospitality Unified commerce A customizable checkout built for subscriptions, memberships, and pre-orders White-glove logistics Our fulfillment network handles the complexities of in-person pickup, national shipping, and local delivery Getting started with Table22 is fast, easy, and free to try We'll design your program, build your storefront, and get you selling — all with no upfront cost Design your program We'll help you build the right subscription, membership, or pre-order program for your business — based on what's worked for thousands of operators like you We handle the hard parts Storefronts, payments, delivery logistics, customer support, and marketing – managed for you New revenue, from untapped customers 80% of subscribers haven't visited in the past year — we let you monetize patrons who love your brand but can't always walk through the door Made by you, powered by Table22 For busy operators, Table22 takes the headache out of subscription growth.
